case.title: Columns in Detail
case.description: Overrides the group and report level settings for number of columns.

case.title: Balance column height
case.description: Whether to balance column heights when the layout has more than one column.

case.title: Has Header
case.description: Overrides the report Header setting for this section.

case.title: Has Page Header
case.description: Overrides the report Page Header setting for this section.

case.title: Has Continuation Header
case.description: Overrides the report Continuation Header setting for this section.

case.title: Records with Header
case.description: Sets the minimum number of records that need to appear below the Header.

case.title: Has Footer
case.description: Overrides the report Footer setting for this section.

case.title: Has Page Footer
case.description: Overrides the report Page Footer setting for this section.

case.title: Has Continuation Footer
case.description: Overrides the report Continuation Footer setting for this section.

case.title: Records with Footer
case.description: Sets the minimum number of records that need to appear above the Footer.

case.title: Order Expression
case.description: An expression that orders the records in the current detail section.

case.title: Ascending Descending
case.description: Indicates whether to sort records in ascending or descending order.

case.title: Filter Expression
case.description: An expression that selects the records for the current detail section.

case.title: Select
case.description: An additional selection criterion that picks: "All", "Marked", or "Unmarked" records.

case.title: Base report on current selection of records
case.description: The contents of the detail section will be based on the filter and order expressions that you have specified.

case.title: Prompt for criteria at print time
case.description: Alpha Five will display a genie at print time, letting you select a primary index, starting and ending key value, and other options. The criteria that you specify at print time are in addition to any criteria that you may have entered in the Filter expression and Order expression boxes.

case.title: Use filter/order from Query
case.description: The contents of the detail section will be based on the filter and order expressions specified by a query.
